# Privacy Policy

**Effective Date: February 1, 2026**
**Last Updated: February 1, 2026**

---

## 1. Introduction

Welcome to "Job Calculator" (hereinafter referred to as "the App"). We understand the importance of privacy to our users and have therefore developed this Privacy Policy to explain how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. By using this App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

---

## 2. Information We Collect

### 2.1 Information We Collect

This App is committed to minimizing data collection and only collects information necessary for providing services:

#### 2.1.1 Local Storage Data

This App uses `MMKV` storage technology to store the following data locally on your device:

- **User Preferences**: Including language selection, theme colors, and other personalized settings
- **Job Assessment Data**: All form data you fill in during job evaluation (e.g., salary, working hours, city selection)
- **History Records**: Job evaluation history records you save
- **Score Results**: Generated work cost-effectiveness scores and report content

**Important Note**: All the above data is stored locally on your device and will not be uploaded to any server.

#### 2.1.2 System Permissions Usage

This App requests the following system permissions and uses them only for declared purposes:

**iOS Platform Permissions:**
- **File Timestamp (NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryFileTimestamp)**: Used to detect the last modification time of application data files to implement data persistence functionality.
- **User Defaults (NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryUserDefaults)**: Used to store and read user preferences such as language and theme selection.
- **System Boot Time (NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategorySystemBootTime)**: Used to track app usage duration and launch frequency (for internal data analysis only, no personal identity information collected).

**Android Platform Permissions:**
- **Internet Access Permission (INTERNET)**: Used to load online resources (such as country data, PPP coefficients, etc.), does not involve personal data transmission.

### 2.2 Information We Do Not Collect

To protect your privacy, we explicitly commit to:
- ❌ We do not collect your name, phone number, email, ID card or other personal identity information
- ❌ We do not collect your geographic location information
- ❌ We do not collect your contacts, SMS, call records or other communication data
- ❌ We do not collect your photos, videos or other media files
- ❌ We do not use third-party tracking SDKs or advertising identifiers
- ❌ We do not engage in any form of user behavior tracking

---

## 3. How We Use Your Information

### 3.1 Purpose of Use

We use collected information only within the following scope:

1. **Feature Implementation**:
   - Work cost-effectiveness calculation and scoring
   - Saving and displaying history records
   - Persistence of user preferences (language, theme)

2. **App Optimization**:
   - Statistics on launch frequency and system boot time (anonymous data)
   - Optimize app performance and user experience

3. **Offline Functionality**:
   - Support full feature usage without network connection
   - Local reading and management of history records

### 3.2 Information Sharing

We commit to:
- ❌ We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with any third party
- ❌ We do not use your data for advertising投放 or marketing promotion
- ❌ We do not share data with third-party service providers (the App has no third-party integration)

---

## 4. Data Storage and Security

### 4.1 Data Storage Location

All user data is stored locally on your device, using the following encryption and protection measures:
- Use `MMKV` high-performance key-value storage with automatic encryption support
- Data is stored only within the app sandbox, inaccessible by other apps
- iOS devices enjoy system-level file encryption protection
- Android devices enjoy app sandbox and permission mechanism protection

### 4.2 Data Deletion

You can delete locally stored data at any time:
- Find the history feature in the "My" page within the App
- Click the delete button to delete any history record
- Uninstalling the App will permanently clear all local data

### 4.3 Data Security Measures

We take the following measures to protect your data security:
- Use mature open-source storage library (MMKV) with regular security patch updates
- Follow iOS and Android platform security specifications
- Code audits ensure no data leakage risks
- No external database, eliminating cloud leakage risks

---

## 5. Protection of Minors

This App is intended for adult professionals and does not intentionally collect information from minors. If you are under 18 years of age, please use this App under the guidance of a guardian.

---

## 6. Your Rights

Under relevant laws and regulations, you enjoy the following rights:

### 6.1 Right of Access

You can view all data stored in the App at any time, including history records and settings.

### 6.2 Right to Delete

You can delete any history record or uninstall the App to clear all data at any time.

### 6.3 Right to Correct

You can modify job assessment data at any time and regenerate the report.

### 6.4 Right to Withdraw

You may choose to stop using this App; uninstalling it will terminate data collection.

---

## 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

This App:
- ❌ Does not use Cookies
- ❌ Does not use Web Beacons
- ❌ Does not use pixel tags
- ❌ Does not use any form of tracking technology

---

## 8. Third-Party Services

This App does not integrate any third-party SDKs or services, including but not limited to:
- Social media login
- Advertising投放 platforms
- Analytics tools (such as Google Analytics, Umeng, etc.)
- Payment platforms

All features are implemented by local code without network connection (except for loading basic resources such as country data).

---

## 9. Privacy Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When making significant changes, we will notify you through the following means within the App:
- Update popup upon first launch of new version
- Update notification displayed in in-app announcement bar

Continued use of this App indicates your consent to the updated Privacy Policy.

---

## 10. Contact Us

If you have any questions, comments, or complaints regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us via:

- **Email**: support@cctv3.net
- **In-App Feedback**: Submit feedback through the "About Us" feature on the "My" page

We will respond within 15 business days of receiving your inquiry.

---

## 11. Applicable Law

The interpretation and dispute resolution of this Privacy Policy are governed by the laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China.

---

## 12. Appendix: Detailed Description of Permission Usage

### iOS Permissions Description

| Permission Type | Code Identifier | Purpose of Use | Involves Personal Data |
|---------|----------|---------|---------------|
| File Timestamp | C617.1 | Detect modification time of data files to implement data persistence | No |
| User Defaults | CA92.1 | Store and read user preferences such as language and theme | No |
| System Boot Time | 35F9.1 | Statistics on app launch frequency and duration (anonymous) | No |

### Android Permissions Description

| Permission Name | Permission Code | Purpose of Use | Involves Personal Data |
|---------|----------|---------|---------------|
| Internet Access | INTERNET | Load country data, PPP coefficients and other online resources | No |

---

**This App's privacy policy complies with the requirements of relevant laws and regulations such as the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China and the Cybersecurity Law.**
